text: Ingangarir God amizim, a Moses Osirizir Arazibagh amizɨ da otifi. Ezɨ tuavir kamɨn ovevem otos. Dughiar kam God dagɨam abɨghizɨ, osiziriba vaghavagha an otifi, ezɨ Godɨn angazangarim uaghan ize. Egha angazangarir kam Mosesɨn guam a gisira, ezɨ Israelba an guamɨn ganan buraghburaki. Ezɨ gɨn angazangarir kam gɨfa.
